web-app.display-name: myapp Project on Strust 2 and Glassfish 3.0.1

init-param.param-value:
[main] builtInCacheManager = org.apache.shiro.cache.MemoryConstrainedCacheManager securityManager.cacheManager = $builtInCacheManager
# Ehcache builtInCacheManager = org.apache.shiro.cache.MemoryConstrainedCacheManager securityManager.cacheManager = $builtInCacheManager
# Create JDBC realm. jdbcRealm = org.apache.shiro.realm.jdbc.JdbcRealm
# Configure JDBC realm datasource. dataSource = com.mysql.jdbc.jdbc2.optional.MysqlDataSource dataSource.URL = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/app dataSource.user = root dataSource.password = "" jdbcRealm.dataSource = $dataSource
# Configure JDBC realm SQL queries. jdbcRealm.authenticationQuery = SELECT password FROM Credential WHERE status = 'A' and username = ? jdbcRealm.userRolesQuery = SELECT c.role FROM role c, UserRole d WHERE c.role_id and d.role_id and user_Id = (select b.user_id from credential a, usercredential b where a.credential_id = b.credential_id and a.username = ?)
roles.unauthorizedUrl = /WEB-INF/results/login.jsp
[urls] /WEB-INF/results/secure/** = authcBasic /WEB-INF/results/admin/** = authcBasic /WEB-INF/results/login.jsp = authc
